channel.title: Old Co-Owner screwed us up
channel.description:
We recently cut a co-owner out of our server, and he somehow ruined our webclient so that no one can connect to it.
we cut him out while he was asleep; changed every password, and had the VPS restarted.
i dont know what happened, and i think we have tried just about everything.
he says that he "buttf**ked" our webclient, but the download client doesnt work either.
if anyone can help me out, that would be great.
rune-server lists us as online.

item.title: Old Co-Owner screwed us up
item.dc:creator: @DuhPk DuhPk
item.description:
@DuhPk wrote:

[quote=“Jnet9102, post:1, topic:358389”]We recently cut a co-owner out of our server, and he somehow ruined our webclient so that no one can connect to it.

we cut him out while he was asleep; changed every password, and had the VPS restarted.

i dont know what happened, and i think we have tried just about everything.

he says that he “buttf**ked” our webclient, but the download client doesnt work either.

if anyone can help me out, that would be great.

google lists us as online.[/quote]

Just tell everyone to delete the cache from where its loaded from on their computer than have the webclient redownload the cache and see if that works

Read full topic

he controls your forums?
